short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Create short and easy-to-share clips of the screen.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
RecURL is a browser extension that allows you to record, capture and share your screen in a snap. With RecURL, you can create short and catchy clips of any web page, app, or game on your screen. Whether you want to showcase a product, demonstrate a feature, report a bug, or share a funny moment, RecURL makes it easy and fun. Just install the extension, click the RecURL icon, and start recording. When you're done, you can then copy the clip URL to your clipboard and share it. RecURL also stores your clips in the cloud, so you can access them anytime, anywhere. RecURL is the ultimate screen recording and sharing solution for your browser. 

Try RecURL today and see how it can help you !
